message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be a great fit for you, and I'm confident it will meet your needs. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort you've put into this. I'm willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.
Bob, thanks for your consideration. I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its value to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
I understand Alice, but I still feel that $12,000 is too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,000 for the product.
